name: Color Jumper (itch) (afells)
description:
This is Color Jumper  3D platform where the rules of the game are color-coded.  This is my submission for the Mini jam 73.  Following the jams limitation, there are 5 colors and those colors are:

White level foundation

Black solid block

Blue is a lie don't trust blue ;)

Red is a hazard 

Purple is the goal reach purple to reach the next level

controls are WASD or the arrow keys and you can look around with the mouse.

I hope you all enjoy my game and any feedback is greatly appreciated.

p.s The menu screen isn't colorful to avoid going over the limitation of the jam and This game is very bright I apologize if it hurts your eyes I may make a dark mode theme for it lol.
